properties.Name: CreditReview
properties.Description: A one-time, follow-up or regularly scheduled review of Customer credit by a Credit Rating Agency.

Columns.Name: CreditReviewCaseId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Credit Review.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: CreditRatingAgencyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Credit Rating Agency.

Columns.Name: CreditReviewCasePeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period starting date for which the associated Credit Review is performed.

Columns.Name: CreditReviewCasePeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period ending date for which the associated Credit Review is performed.

Columns.Name: CreditReviewCaseCompletedDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Credit Review Case was completed.

Columns.Name: PerformedByName
Columns.Description: The name of the individual performing or responsible for the Credit Review.

Columns.Name: CreditReviewResultsCommentary
Columns.Description: Notes or comments regarding the Credit Review.

Columns.Name: CreditRiskId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Credit Risk.
